wipe_door.description: Wipe the door to remove dust and grime.

door_rotation_complete.description: The rotation of the door is complete.

rotate_door.description: Rotate the door of the furniture for openning or closing it.

clean_door.description: Clean the rotation door to remove any dirt or debris.

rotate_the_door.description: Rotate the door of the furniture to open or close it.

swipe_door.description: Swipe the door of the furniture for cleaning purpose.

clean_rotation_door.description: Wipe the rotation door to remove dirt and debris, ensuring it is clean.

spin_door.description: Spin the rotation door to adjust its position.

polish_door.description: Polish the rotation door to enhance its appearance.

evaluate_door.description: Evaluate the door to check for any faults or defects.

swing_door.description: Swing the door of the furniture for better accessibility.

smudge_door.description: Smudge the door of the furniture to spread cleaning solution.

body_inspect.description: Inspect the furniture body for any potential damage or wear and tear.

body_wipe_down.description: Wipe down the furniture body to ensure it is clean.

body_press_check.description: Press the body of the furniture to check its stability.

clean_furniture_body.description: Clean the furniture body to remove dust or any particles that might harm the surface.

inspect_furniture_body.description: Inspect the furniture body for any scratches or damages.

press_furniture_body.description: Add pressure to the body of the furniture to make sure it's stable.

touch_furniture_body.description: Touch the body of the furniture to feel its smoothness.

wipe_furniture_body.description: Wipe the body of the furniture to keep it clean.

swipe_furniture_body.description: Swipe the body of the furniture for cleaning purpose.

polish_furniture_body.description: Polish the furniture body to enhance its shiny surface.

survey_furniture_body.description: Survey the furniture body for any possible damage or repair needs.

nudge_furniture_body.description: Nudge the body of the furniture to ensure its stability.

sense_furniture_body.description: Sense the furniture body surface to check its texture.

smudge_furniture_body.description: Smudge the body of the furniture to spread cleaning solution.

furniture_overall_cleanup.description: Clean the whole furniture including wiping the door and the body.

rotate_door_press_body.description: Rotate the door and press the furniture body to check its functionality and stability.

full_inspect_cleanup.description: Inspect, clean, and press the furniture to ensure its cleanliness and stability.

clean_whole_furniture.description: Clean the entire furniture including the furniture body and the door.

rotate_door_and_clean_whole_furniture.description: Rotate the door, and clean the entire furniture including the furniture body and the door.

inspect_and_clean_furniture.description: Inspect and clean the entire furniture

rotate_and_wipe_door.description: Rotate the door and clean it afterwards.

touch_and_wipe_body.description: Touch the body to feel its texture and clean it afterwards to maintain its smoothness.

clean_complete_furniture.description: Rotate the door, touch the body, and clean the whole furniture accordingly.

press_and_clean_body.description: Press and clean the body to ensure its stability and cleanliness.

whole_furniture_cleanup.description: Rotate the door, press the body, and clean the whole furniture accordingly.

wholly_clean_furniture.description: Completely clean the furniture including both body and door.

sense_and_smudge_body.description: Sense the body to feel its texture and smudge it afterwards to ensure cleanliness.

firm_and_polish_furniture.description: Swing the door, nudge the body and polish the whole furniture accordingly.

complete_furniture_operation.description: Rotate the door, nudge the body, and polish the whole furniture for optimal look and function.
